Ok, here are stats for my 100% legitimate team before I head into the 
tevfifty or my own scenarios.  Notice, most of the time, my team was 
not good enough to handle "Battle" level without loss of life.  Also, 
I was finally able to take a scenario on "Slaughter" during my last 
scenario.

Name          str   dex   con    int   arm  level   type
Healer        66     66    66    250    66    18    cleric
Healer2       65     65    65    250    65    20    cleric
Archmagus     67     67    67    310    67    22    archmage
Magus         75     75    75    300    75     7    mage

Yep, I confess I stacked the odds to help my mage get more experience 
and surive easier.

I have a few archmage related questions:

1)if I summon the image of an archer, I summon a fire elemental, and
I 
shoot explosive bolts at my fire elemental, does the game count 
experience points for the damage done to my fire elemental?

2)said of conditions of number 1 plus I summon the image of a cleric 
and the cleric heals both my mage, does the game count experience 
points for the healing done by my cleric?

3) suppose an image of a cleric resurrects one of my team members.  
Does the archmage lose experience for the resurrection of the team 
member?
